ORDER
When the matter came up for hearing, the learned counsel
appearing for the petitioner prays that the petitioner be
permitted to withdraw this petition without prejudice to his
right to pursue his remedies in accordance with law. With the
above right, the petition will stand dismissed as withdrawn
